title: SMC_TRIGGER_STATUS (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_TRIGGER_STATUS :
The status of a trigger.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: Unknown
rows.Comment:
The trigger is unknown, either because it
never existed or because it no longer exists.

rows.Name: Enabled
rows.Comment:
The trigger is enabled, has not yet been
reached, and the trigger time is still unknown.

rows.Name: Active
rows.Comment:
The trigger is active and the trigger time
can be checked.

rows.Name: Error
rows.Comment: An error occurred while processing the trigger.
